changerequest.sheet.checks.button.title=Some checks conditions have not been met, click to see what should be fixed for merging. changerequest.sheet.checks.status.ready.explanation=This change request changerequest.sheet.close.button.title=Close the change request without deleting it. changerequest.sheet.open.button=Open changerequest.sheet.open.button.title=Open back the change request as ready for review. changerequest.sheet.open_draft.button=Open as draft changerequest.sheet.open_draft.button.title=Open back the change request as draft. changerequest.filechange.type.EDITION=Edition changerequest.filechange.type.DELETION=Deletion changerequest.filechange.type.CREATION=Creation changerequest.filechange.type.NO_CHANGE=No change changerequest.livetable.filechange.doc.location=Location changerequest.livetable.filechange.doc.title=Title changerequest.livetable.filechange.filechange_type=Change type changerequest.livetable.filechange.filechange_author=Author of last change changerequest.livetable.filechange.filechange_version=Version changerequest.livetable.filechange.filechange_documentVersion=Published document version changerequest.livetable.filechange._actions=Actions changerequest.sheet.tab.approvers.title=Approvers ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_approvalStrategy=Merge Approval Strategy ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_approvalStrategy.hint=Strategy to comply with for allowing merging a change request. ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_changeRequestLocation=Change Request Storage Location ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_changeRequestLocation.hint=Space where the change requests pages are stored. ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_durationBeforeClosingStale=Duration to consider before closing stale change request ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_durationBeforeClosingStale.hint=Duration expressed in days. Depending on the other options, this duration is considered since last activity of the change request, since it has been opened, or since it has been notified as stale. Setting this value to 0 will disable the feature. ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_durationBeforeNotifyingStale=Duration to consider before notifying about stale change request ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_durationBeforeNotifyingStale.hint=Duration expressed in days. This duration is considered since last activity of the change request, or since its creation depending on the other options. Setting this value to 0 will disable the feature. ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_useCreationDateForStaleDurations=Use the creation date for stale change requests ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_useCreationDateForStaleDurations.hint=Selecting Yes means that the creation date is only used to detect a stale change request. Selecting No means that the last activity of the change request will be used. ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_schedulerContextUser=Scheduler user ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_schedulerContextUser.hint=The user selected here will be the author of the notifications and updates when detecting a stale change request. This user should have appropriate rights for this. By default the author of the scheduler documents is used. ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_mergeUser=Merge user ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_mergeUser.hint=If a user is specified here, this user will always be used when merging change requests to save the actual changes. So this user should have appropriate rights to do so. If nothing is specified here, then the user clicking on the merge button is used to save the changes. changerequest.moreactions.manageapprovers=Manage approvers changerequest.moreactions.deletionrequest=Request for deletion ChangeRequest.Code.ApproversClass_usersApprovers=Users who can approve ChangeRequest.Code.ApproversClass_usersApprovers_hint=Users of the wiki who are able to approve any change request made for this document. ChangeRequest.Code.ApproversClass_groupsApprovers=Groups who can approve ChangeRequest.Code.ApproversClass_groupsApprovers_hint=Groups of users of the wiki who are able to approve any change request made for this document. changerequest.timeline.changerequest.create={0} created the change request with changes concerning {2} changerequest.timeline.changerequest.filechange.added={0} added a new file change concerning {2} changerequest.timeline.changerequest.status.modified={0} changed the status of the change request from {1} to {2} changerequest.timeline.changerequest.review.added.approval={0} added a new approval review changerequest.timeline.changerequest.review.added.requestchanges={0} added a new review requesting for changes changerequest.timeline.changerequest.discussions.CHANGE_REQUEST_COMMENT={0} added {1}a new global comment{2} changerequest.timeline.changerequest.discussions.LINE_DIFF={0} added {1}a new diff comment{2} changerequest.timeline.changerequest.discussions.REVIEW={0} added {1}a new review comment{2} changerequest.timeline.changerequest.updated={0} edited the description or the title of the change request changerequest.timeline.changerequest.stale={0} marked the change request as stale changerequest.timeline.changerequest.rebased.all={0} refreshed the content of the whole change request changerequest.timeline.changerequest.rebased.filechange={0} refreshed the changes concerning {2} changerequest.timeline.changerequest.rebased.conflictFixing={0} fixed a conflict concerning {2} changerequest.sheet.description.placeholder=Click on the edit link on the right to provide a description. changerequest.sheet.existingChangeRequestSameChanges=Other change requests exist targeting one or several of the pages modified here: changerequest.sheet.checks.otherCR.title=Existing change requests on same documents changerequest.sheet.ready.button.title=Mark this change request as ready for review changerequest.sheet.ready.button=Ready for review changerequest.sheet.draft.button.title=Convert this change request as a draft changerequest.sheet.draft.button=Convert to draft changerequest.sheet.review.button.title=Review the current change request changerequest.sheet.review.button=Review changerequest.sheet.diff.conflictLabel=Conflicts changerequest.sheet.diff.conflictLabel.title=Those changes are in conflict with the new published version of the document. You must fix the conflicts for allowing to merge. changerequest.sheet.message.outdated=outdated changerequest.sheet.message.outdated.title=This message is outdated: the diff changed since it was written. changerequest.sheet.diff.outdated=outdated changerequest.sheet.diff.outdated.title=There was new changes in the published version of the document since this change request was edited. It is recommended to update the change request to see latest differences if possible. changerequest.sheet.diff.nochange=No change changerequest.sheet.message.collapse.button.title=Click to collapse the message. changerequest.sheet.message.expand.button.title=Click to expand the message. changerequest.sheet.message.reply.button.title=Reply to this message changerequest.sheet.message.reply.button=Reply ChangeRequest.Code.ChangeRequestClass_status_draft=Draft ChangeRequest.Code.ChangeRequestClass_status_merged=Merged ChangeRequest.Code.ChangeRequestClass_status_ready_for_review=Ready for review ChangeRequest.Code.ChangeRequestClass_status_ready_for_merging=Ready for merging ChangeRequest.Code.ChangeRequestClass_status_closed=Closed ChangeRequest.Code.ChangeRequestClass_status_stale=Closed (stale) changerequest.user.profile.menu=Change Requests changerequest.user.profile.authorcr.title=Authored Change Requests changerequest.user.profile.approverscr.title=Change Requests to review changerequest.conflict.modal.title=Fix conflict changerequest.conflict.modal.description=This interface allows you to chose how to handle the conflicts related to this change request. You can navigate between the versions to see the changes before performing your choice. changerequest.conflict.modal.description.EDITION=Conflicts occurred because the original document for which you proposed changes has been edited since you opened the change request. You can keep your changes as they are, or keep the changes of the published version, or try to resolve the conflict manually with a custom resolution. changerequest.conflict.modal.description.CREATION=Conflicts occurred because the page you requested for creation has been created since you opened the change request. You can decide to keep your changes, or to keep the published version. changerequest.conflict.modal.recommended=recommended changerequest.conflict.modal.options.keepcr.title=Keep change request changerequest.conflict.modal.options.keepcr.description=Fix the conflicts by keeping change request version. changerequest.conflict.modal.options.keeppublished.title=Keep published version changerequest.conflict.modal.options.keeppublished.description=Fix the conflicts by keeping published version. changerequest.savemodal.approvers.header.title=Approvers management changerequest.savemodal.approvers.header.hint=You can specify the list of users and groups that should be allowed to approve the changes on that page. Those lists will be submitted in a change request, either a new one or an existing one. changerequest.savemodal.approvers.heading=Approvers changerequest.savemodal.approvers.users=Users who can approve changerequest.savemodal.approvers.groups=Groups who can approve changerequest.sheet.message.reply.header=Reply to message from {0} sent {1}. changerequest.sheet.message.reply.link.title=Click to navigate to the previous message.
